tags.name: Access Token
tags.description: The Access Token that allows access to the Pax8 API

tags.name: Companies
tags.description: Companies represent the customers your organization serves through the Pax8 platform. Fetch a list of your company records, or a specific company by its companyId

tags.name: Products
tags.description: The Products resource lets you fetch all the information required to complete an Order -- product descriptions, pricing, provisioning details, and the dependencies associated with each product

tags.name: Orders
tags.description: Orders describe your purchases of Pax8 products. Endpoints let you create new product orders and query past purchases

tags.name: Subscriptions
tags.description: Subscriptions describe terms of service, including price and the billing start/end dates for a specified product/company combination. Resources let you update, cancel, and fetch details of existing subscriptions

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: Contacts represent the people who should be provided visibility into events such as provisioning

post.description: Create a new Access Token. Use the code examples to create an Access token on your local machine. Then copy the `access_token` into the Authorization header of any endpoint in the documentation to start making calls. The audience should be set to `https://api.pax8.com` for the partner endpoints.

Creates a new Company. ATTENTION - The Company will be placed in an “inactive” status until the [Company has primary Contacts added](#tag/Contacts). Once contacts are added, the company will move to “active”.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all your companies filtered by optional parameters

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to request for in the companies list

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Return this number of company records per page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return companies sorted by this field and direction. Formatted as fieldName,direction - ex. sort=name,desc

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```city``` value

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```country``` value

parameters.name: stateOrProvince
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```stateOrProvince``` value

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```postalCode``` value

parameters.name: selfServiceAllowed
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```selfServiceAllowed``` value

parameters.name: billOnBehalfOfEnabled
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```billOnBehalfOfEnabled``` value

parameters.name: orderApprovalRequired
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```orderApprovalRequired``` value

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return only companies matching this ```status``` value

get.description: Returns a single company record matching the ```companyId``` you specify

patch.description: Updates an existing Company. ATTENTION - at least one parameter has to be modified.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of contacts ordered by ```createDate``` descending

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to request for in the contacts list

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Return this number of company records per page

get.description: Returns a contact
Returns a paginated list of Pax8 products filtered by optional query parameters

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to request for in the products list

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Return this number of products per page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return products sorted by the field and direction specified. Formatted as fieldName, direction - ex. sort=name,desc

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search on fields like name, vendor, SKU and ID.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: Return only products matching the specified vendor name

get.description: Returns only the product record for the productId you specify
Returns provisioning details for the specified productId. Provisioning details for a product are dynamic data.
Returns associated dependencies for the specified ```productId```. A products dependencies are dynamic data.
Returns recommended pricing and partner cost for the specified productId. A products pricing is dynamic data.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The product id

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Use the companyId in the query to see company-specific pricing

get.description: Returns a paginated list of orders. Currently NOT supported for scheduled orders(orders with a future date).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to request for in the orders list

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The company id to filter on

post.description: Create a new order. Currently NOT supported for scheduled orders(orders with a future date).

parameters.name: isMock
parameters.description: Perform validations only. Skip any interactions with the database.

get.description: Returns the Order record specified by OrderId. Currently NOT supported for scheduled orders

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for an order record

get.description: Fetch a paginated list of subscriptions. Default page is 0 and default size is 10. The maximum page size is 200

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to request in the subscriptions list

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Returns _this_ number of subscriptions per page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return subscriptions sorted by this field and direction Formatted as fieldName,direction - ex. sort=createdDate,desc

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return only subscriptions matching this ```status``` value

parameters.name: billingTerm
parameters.description: Return only subscriptions matching this ```billingTerm``` value

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Return only subscriptions matching this ```companyId``` value

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Return only subscriptions matching this ```productId``` value

get.description: Returns the Subscription record specified by the subscriptionId

put.description: Updates a subscription. Currently NOT supported for subscriptions with a future date.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: subscription to be updated

delete.description: Cancels the Subscription specified by subscriptionId

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: subscription to be updated

parameters.name: cancelDate
parameters.description: The date to cancel the subscription on

get.description: Returns a list of changes for a subscription
Fetch a paginated list of invoices. Default page is 0 and default size is 10. The maximum page size is 200

parameters.description: The page number to request in the invoices list

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Returns _this_ number of invoices per page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return invoices sorted by this field and direction Formatted as fieldName,direction - ex. sort=invoiceDate,desc

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return only invoices matching this ```status``` value

parameters.name: invoiceDate
parameters.description: Return only invoices matching this ```invoiceDate``` value

parameters.name: invoiceDateRangeStart
parameters.description: Return only invoices with an ```invoiceDate``` greater than or equal to this date

parameters.name: invoiceDateRangeEnd
parameters.description: Return only invoices with an ```invoiceDate``` less than or equal to this date

parameters.name: dueDate
parameters.description: Return only invoices matching this ```dueDate``` value

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: Return only invoices matching this ```total``` value

parameters.name: balance
parameters.description: Return only invoices matching this ```balance``` value

parameters.name: carriedBalance
parameters.description: Return only invoices matching this ```carriedBalance``` value

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Return only invoices matching this ```companyId``` value

get.description: Fetch a paginated list of usage summaries. Default page is 0 and default size is 10. The maximum page size is 200

parameters.name: size

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return usage summaries sorted by this field and direction Formatted as fieldName,direction - ex. sort=resourceGroup,desc

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.description: Return only usage summaries matching this ```resourceGroup``` value

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Return only usage summaries with this ```companyId``` value

get.description: Fetch a paginated list of usage summaries. Default page is 0 and default size is 10. The maximum page size is 200

parameters.name: usageSummaryId
parameters.description: The usage summary id

get.description: Fetch a paginated list of usage lines. Default page is 0 and default size is 10. The maximum page size is 200

parameters.name: usageSummaryId
parameters.description: The usage summary id

parameters.name: usageDate
parameters.description: The date usage was recorded

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Return only usage summaries with this ```productId``` value

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of draft invoice items before they are finalized into invoices. Default page is 0 and default size is 10. The maximum page size is 200.

DISCLAIMER: For future-dated items, the data represents a snapshot of charges that will be applied to a future invoice as of the request date. This is not an actual invoice. Clients should be aware that the final invoice generated on the 5th of the month may differ. This endpoint does not include charges for usage-based products billed in arrears. Tax calculations are based on current account taxability status and current month tax rates, both of which are subject to change for future invoices.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to request in the draft invoice items list

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Returns _this_ number of draft invoice items per page

parameters.name: monthOffset
parameters.description: Number of months from current to return draft items for. 0 = current month, 1 = next month. Only values 0 and 1 are currently supported. If omitted, defaults to 1 (next month).

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Filter draft items to a specific company.

expires_in.description: The time to live of the Access Token in seconds

id.description: The unique id of the company

phone.description: The primary phone number of the company

website.description: The full URL of the company website

externalId.description: An external ID that can be assigned to the company for reference

billOnBehalfOfEnabled.description: Value is ```true``` if Pax8 handles billing transactions, value is ```false``` if partner handles billing transactions

selfServiceAllowed.description: Value is ```true``` if self-service privileges are available to the company, otherwise value is ```false```

orderApprovalRequired.description: Value is ```true``` if the company's self-service orders require approval, otherwise value is ```false```

status.description:
Company Status:
  * `Active` - The company is active
  * `Inactive` - The company is inactive due to missing contacts
  * `Deleted` - The company has been deleted

requiresCommitment.description: Whether the product requires a commitment

name.description: The name of the product constraint

products.description: A list of products that satisfy the constraint

startQuantityRange.description: The start of the quantity range. If not set 0 is the default

endQuantityRange.description: The end of the quantity range. If ```null``` there is no end of range

chargeType.description:
Rate Charge Type:
  * `Per Unit` - The rate is multiplied directly by the quantity based on the start and end quantity range
  * `Flat Rate` - The rate is flat for the quantity based on the start and end quantity range

id.description: Unique identifier for the commitment record

autoRenew.description: Renews without manual intervention at the end of the term

renewalWindowDaysBeforeTermEnd.description: Number of days _before_ term end-date when renewal window opens

renewalWindowDaysAfterTermEnd.description: Number of days after the term end-date that renewal window closes

allowForQuantityIncrease.description: Is ```true``` if quantity can be increased during commitment term

allowForQuantityDecrease.description: Is ```true``` if quantity can be decreased during commitment term

allowForEarlyCancellation.description: Is ```true``` if commitment can be cancelled prior to end of term

cancellationFeeApplied.description: Is ```true``` if canceling subscription entails a fee

isTransferable.description: Is ```true``` if commitment can be transferred to another company

id.description: Unique identifier for the commitment record

values.description: A list of values based on the ```valuetype``` and ```possibleValues```

description.description: Instructions and context to help enter the required provisioning information

valueType.description:
Provisioning Detail Value Type:
 * `Input` - A value that is supplied by a user
 * `Single-Value` - A single value that is picked from the `possibleValues` list
 * `Multi-Value` - One or multiple values that are picked from the `possibleValues` list

possibleValues.description: A list of possible values. `possibleValues` will be null when `valueType` is `Input`

companyId.description: unique id of the purchasing company ie. end-user

createdDate.description: the date the order was created

orderedBy.description: the type of user who created the order

orderedByUserId.description: unique id of the user who created this order

orderedByUserEmail.description: the email address of the user who created this order

isScheduled.description: is ```true``` if order is future dated

companyId.description: unique id of the purchasing company ie. end-user

createdDate.description: the date the order was created

orderedBy.description: the type of user who created the order

orderedByUserId.description: unique id of the user who created this order

orderedByUserEmail.description: the email address of the user who created this order

isScheduled.description: is ```true``` if order is future dated

vendorSubscriptionId.description: The vendor's unique identifier for this subscription

status.description:
Subscription Status :
 * `Active` - Provisioning request complete
 * `Cancelled` - Deprovisioning request complete
 * `PendingManual` -  An associated manual provisioning task isn't started/completed
 * `PendingAutomated` - An associated automated provisioning task isn't started/completed
 * `PendingCancel` - Deprovisioning request pending
 * `WaitingForDetails` - Provisioning details are missing
 * `Trial` - Trial subscriptions offer free or discounted access for a limited time.
 * `Converted` - Converted from trial
 * `PendingActivation` - Requires Activation but has not yet been activated
 * `Activated` - Requires Activation and has been activated

Activation is required for a small subset of products.  Billing services do not begin for these products until "activation" is complete.

commitmentTermId.description: This field is required when the product associated with the order has requiresCommitment field set to true. To pick the correct commitment term, use the https://devx.pax8.com/reference/findproductdependenciesbyproductid endpoint and chose a commitment term whose term field represents an equal or greater time than the desired billingTerm. For example, when the order billingTerm is annual, pass the identifier of the commitment term that matches an annual commitment, or if desired and available, pass a commitment term id of 2-year, or 3-year

lineItemNumber.description: Required. Number used as a reference to the line item for parent line items

parentSubscriptionId.description: Reference to the subscription this item depends on

parentLineItemNumber.description: Reference to the required parent line item in this same order

lineItemNumber.description: Required. Number used as a reference to the line item for parent line items

parentSubscriptionId.description: Reference to the subscription this item depends on

parentLineItemNumber.description: Reference to the required parent line item in this same order

type.description:
A company must have a primary contact for each contact type. A single contact can be marked as a primary contact for all types
Contact Type:
  * `Admin` - Administrative contact
  * `Billing` - Billing contact
  * `Technical` - Technical contact

primary.description: Is this contact the primary contact for this Contact Type

invoiceDate.description: The date the invoice is generated for

dueDate.description: The date on which payment is due

carriedBalance.description: The outstanding balance until current invoiceDate

partnerName.description: The name of the invoiced partner

id.description: The unique id for this invoice item

enum: markup (Percentage based markup over to be determined base cost)
single (Single price for any quantity, same as flat)
flat (Single price for any quantity, same as single)

subTotal.description: The customer sub total. Represents cost of services plus billing fees.

costTotal.description: The partner total cost of the services

offeredBy.description: The account who offers this product

billedByPax8.description: Is the item billed directly by Pax8

total.description: The customer total including all services and fees

billingFee.description: The fee for Pax8 billing a bill on behalf of company

billingFeeRate.description: The fee rate for Pax8 billing a bill on behalf of company

amountDue.description: The final total due for the item for this invoice

salesTax.description: The sales tax amount for this invoice item

subscriptionId.description: The identifier of the associated subscription. This field will contain the subscription identifier for all product types, allowing partners to link this invoice line item to the relevant subscription details. Products that do not have a subscription id (i.e., BitTitan migration) will return a null value.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group assigned to the usage summary

partnerTotal.description: The partner total for the current month

isTrial.description: Indicates whether the usage summary is for a trial

usageDate.description: The date the usage was recorded

partnerTotal.description: The partner total for the usage line

unitPrice.description: The unit price of the usage product

isTrial.description: Indicates if the usage line is for a trial

totalElements.description: The total number of elements able to be paged over

totalPages.description: The total number of pages based on the ```size``` and ```totalElements```

token-request-example.description: Header values used for an Access Token request

microsoft-office-365-e3.description: an example response for `Microsoft Office 365 E3`

value.name: Microsoft Office 365 E3
value.shortDescription: Microsoft Office 365 E3 includes fully installed Office applications across multiple devices, email hosting, HD video conferencing, and features to support compliance.
value.description: Microsoft 365 E3 is part of a new lineup of M365 and O365 suites that don't include Teams. Microsoft 365 E3 is designed for large organizations and integrates Office 365 Enterprise E3, Windows 10 Enterprise, and Enterprise Mobility + Security to empower employees to be creative and work together, securely. The comprehensive set of services range from Office apps like Word and Excel, to video conferencing apps, to robust security, mobile device management, and identity and access management. This solution lets you improve productivity and foster a culture of collaboration with connected experiences and transform how you manage your business and enhance customer relationships with integrated workflows. Plus, you can proactively protect your employees, data, and customer information with intelligent security.
